source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_000<tab>Welcome to Isari. I am─ Great kami above! Y-You are <var 29 EB02 /var>, the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who saved our village! Please, if there is anything you need─anything at all─do not hesitate to ask.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_000<tab>ここは、イサリ村だ。
アンタは、村を助けてくださったおヒトかい？
なにもないところだが、ゆっくりしてってくれ。
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_010<tab>I am but a humble fisherman born into this village, like my parents before me and my grandparents before them.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_010<tab>ここで、生まれ育った漁師さ。
両親も、そのまた両親もこの村の出でな。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_011<tab>While lately, many people have been leaving Isari in pursuit of riches, no amount of gold could tempt me to abandon my home here.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_011<tab>立身出世を狙って、村を出ていく者も多いが、
ワタシは、不思議とそんな気が起きなかった。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_012<tab>Sure, I might be poor, but I am happy. There is no better feeling in the world than to step onto a boat in the morning, feel the wind in your hair as you sail, and come back with a big haul of fish.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_012<tab>どんなに生活が苦しくても、
漁のために海に出ると、それだけで幸せなものでね。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_020<tab>Nearly all of us here fish for a living, though our specialties vary quite a bit. Some of us catch the smaller fish with rods, while others use harpoons or nets to reel in the big ones. I, myself, use my hands and dive to collect shellfish from the seabed.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_020<tab>村の者の多くが、漁をして暮らしている。
竿や銛、網を使った漁から、
素潜りで貝や海藻を採ったり、あらゆる漁をしてるのさ。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_021<tab>As you can imagine, our village was never by any means affluent, but ever since the imperials invaded, we often find ourselves unable to afford even the bare essentials.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_021<tab>もともと貧しい村だったが、
帝国の支配を受けて、海賊衆の庇護も失い、
生活は決して楽じゃない。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_022<tab>I just remain grateful that whatever happens we will always have the sea. Though we have fallen on hard times, thanks to her, our tables and stomachs will never want for food.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_022<tab>それでも、村の者たちが、どうにか暮らしていけているのは、
海の恵みがあればこそだ……。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_023<tab>If you are not a very good fisher, however, that might be a different story. Without some aptitude, not only will your hauls be meager, but you will also probably find yourself with very few friends.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3ISARI_00410_INUOI_000_023<tab>この村では、漁の腕前がすべてでね。
腕利きの漁師ほど一目置かれて、尊敬される。
漁の方がからっきしなら……ちょいと生き辛いかもしれないね。
